text:
[Verse]
Lost in the city lights
Walking through the endless nights
Searching for my place
In this crowded space

[Verse 2]
Footsteps echo down the street
Every stranger that I meet
Eyes that never see
The real me set free

[Chorus]
I'm a wandering soul
Nowhere to go
In this crowded place
I need my space

[Verse 3]
Neon signs calling out
Voices blend into a shout
Dreams are getting thin
In this urban spin

[Verse 4]
Skies above so far away
Covered by this urban grey
Heart just wants to fly
But the city's sly

[Chorus]
I'm a wandering soul
Nowhere to go
In this crowded place
I need my space
title: Wandering Soul
